paragraphs.content: Chapter 16
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 16

paragraphs.content: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.

paragraphs.content: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.

paragraphs.content: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.

paragraphs.content: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.

paragraphs.content: But now I go my way to him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?
paragraphs.contentHtml: But now I go my way to him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?

paragraphs.content: But because I have said these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But because I have said these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.

paragraphs.content: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.

paragraphs.content: And when he is come, he will reprove the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And when he is come, he will reprove the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:

paragraphs.content: Of sin, because they believe not on me;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Of sin, because they believe not on me;

paragraphs.content: Of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;

paragraphs.content: Of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.

paragraphs.content: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.

paragraphs.content: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.

paragraphs.content: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.

paragraphs.content: All things that the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he shall take of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: All things that the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he shall take of mine, and shall shew it unto you.

paragraphs.content: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.

paragraphs.content: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?

paragraphs.content: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? we cannot tell what he saith.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? we cannot tell what he saith.

paragraphs.content: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me?

paragraphs.content: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.

paragraphs.content: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.

paragraphs.content: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.

paragraphs.content: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you.

paragraphs.content: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.

paragraphs.content: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs: but the time cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs, but I shall shew you plainly of the Father.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs: but the time cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs, but I shall shew you plainly of the Father.

paragraphs.content: At that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you:
paragraphs.contentHtml: At that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you:

paragraphs.content: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.

paragraphs.content: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.

paragraphs.content: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.

paragraphs.content: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.

paragraphs.content: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?

paragraphs.content: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is now come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is now come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.

paragraphs.content: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
paragraphs.contentHtml: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
